Notes: Description field shows type of discrimination that EEOC had alleged.

Description: The Justice Department reached a settlement agreement with Panda Restaurant Group, Inc. , a restaurant chain with over 1,800 locations, resolving an investigation into whether it discriminated against non-U.S. citizens in violation of the Immigration and Nationality Act (INA) when reverifying their permission to work.

Private Litigation Case Title: Kudo v. Panda Restaurant Group, Inc. et al
